divs: Sighting DetailsObserved disturbance on satellite TV signal, though no rain. Walked outside and observed triangle shaped object appearing to move away from our house, and then rapid acceleration and could not see it anymore.
Summary: silent triangle with a center and other lights at each corner. Center light was brightest
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Elk Grove
There was one other sighting in Elk Grove on or around January 1st 2013
